name: The Gallery of Henri Beauchamp
description:
A little game I made based on the creepy pasta of the same name. I'd give credit to the author, but there isn't any name on the page. Instead, here's the link! (http://creepypasta.wikia.com/wiki/The_Gallery_of_Henri_Beauchamp)

All the images used are from DeviantArt. I own none of it (hence the free price of the game).

It's a small puzzler, made in RPG Maker. It's totally free. So have fun and enjoy!
